item.title: You Know What's Nice on the Eyes? High-Frequency Stock Trading
item.description:
You Know What's Nice on the Eyes? High-Frequency Stock Trading

Behind rooms full of traders barking orders, algorithmically-controlled bots buy, sell, and analyze stocks on the order of milliseconds. These high-frequency trading bots are the real driving force of the world's financial markets, and yet, the average person has little understanding of how they work or their potential impact.

item.title: This Digital Frame Autonomously Plugs Itself In To Charge
item.description:
This Digital Frame Autonomously Plugs Itself In To Charge

Although we've all probably given one to our parents for Christmas, conventional wisdom is that digital photo frames kind of suck. They've got bad interfaces, tiny screens, and need to be plugged in all the time. No wonder, then, that they've never really caught on, especially amongst art lovers.

item.title: Make a Fold-Out, Space-Saving Tool Storage Cabinet for Your Garage or Workshop
item.description:
Make a Fold-Out, Space-Saving Tool Storage Cabinet for Your Garage or Workshop

Every workshop needs a solid tools storage system. If you can DIY it and customize it, all the better. This fold-out pegboard shelving system one packs a ton of storage space in a small footprint. You get three pegboard organizing surfaces in one, thanks to its smart design, and the bins under the tool storage area keep other hardware in reach.

item.title: The Hammock Raft Lets You Outchill Everyone At The Lake
item.description:
The Hammock Raft Lets You Outchill Everyone At The Lake

Ever wish you could rest in a hammock while rowing around in a lake? Yeah, we haven't either. That doesn't make this Hammocraft any less cool, however. As the name would suggest, this structure is designed to hold up to five hammocks (not included) on a floatation device of your choosing so you can out-chill even the chillest bros.

item.title: The 50 Best Drake Songs
item.description:
The 50 Best Drake Songs

In the wake of Thank Me Later, more than a few Drake fans were left wondering if they were ever going to hear the level of stripped-down, intimate Drake records-replete with the roomy beats of Noah "40" Shebib-that put them onto Drake with So Far Gone.

item.title: The Stealthy Rolls Royce Wraith Overdose Pumps Out 717 HP
item.description:
The Stealthy Rolls Royce Wraith Overdose Pumps Out 717 HP

For some, the stock version of Rolls-Royce's Wraith is enough luxury and power to satiate. However, there are always those outliers that try to push the envelope on style and strength. Call them overachievers, dreamers, or spotlight seekers. Whatever they may be, sometimes such a zealous attitude delivers something beautiful.

item.title: Dubai's Futuristic Floating Seahorse Home Boasts Underwater Bedrooms
item.description:
Dubai's Futuristic Floating Seahorse Home Boasts Underwater Bedrooms

Waterfront property has always been valuable, enough so that a bunch of engineers and builders in Dubai decided to push the limits and build a floating home. Just recently, the same group that put out the original version of this home onto the water have circled back with a Signature Edition of the Floating Seahorse - combing the comforts of a luxury home with the perks of being on a yacht.

item.title: Pre-Order SeeNote Today
item.description:
Pre-Order SeeNote Today

SeeNote is the always on, digital sticky note. See important updates and controls from your favorite apps. Never miss what matters.

item.title: Stock Up | Harry's new SPF15 Lip Balm
item.description:
Stock Up | Harry's new SPF15 Lip Balm

Summer is coming, keep those lips in check. If you're like us, you've probably lost a small fortune of lip balms in your life. It's never good enough to buy just one as each stick tends to vanish from your pocket on a regular basis.
